org.apache.felix.ipojo
Class ComponentFactory.FactoryClassloader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.apache.felix.ipojo.ComponentFactory.FactoryClassloader
Enclosing class:
ComponentFactory
private class ComponentFactory.FactoryClassloader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

this class defines the classloader attached to a factory. This class loader is used to load the implementation (e.g. manipulated) class.

Author:
Felix Project Team
See Also:
ClassLoader
